scripts.deploy-master: git checkout master && git pull origin master && gulp build && node node_modules/xvtx deploy --pathFiles arquivos && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy from master' && git push origin master
scripts.deploy-develop: git checkout develop && git pull origin develop && gulp build && node node_modules/xvtx deploy --pathFiles arquivos && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy from develop' && git push origin develop
scripts.deploy-homolog: git checkout homolog && git pull origin homolog && gulp build && node node_modules/xvtx deploy --pathFiles arquivos && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy from homolog' && git push origin homolog
